rows.label: qev013805_MSG0001
rows.name:
I expected you sooner. But no matter. We've only
just begun, after all. Now please enjoy the show.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0002
rows.name: Well, Ma-non? It's time to decide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0004
rows.name:
Would you prefer to jump of your own will
or die by a bullet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0005
rows.name: N-neither...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0006
rows.name: I see. In that case...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_JNK0110
rows.name: Stop Alex

rows.label: qev013805_SEL0111
rows.name: Shout at Alex to stop.

rows.label: qev013805_JNK0120
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: qev013805_SEL0121
rows.name: Watch and see how this plays out.

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0014
rows.name:
Now you! Klaatu or...whatever it was. I don't know.
I can't be bothered to memorize every gibberish xeno
name that comes across my desk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0015
rows.name: Er, my name is Arwae?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0016
rows.name:
We Ma-non can offer humans new technology,
you know? So you don't really gain anything by
murdering us, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0017
rows.name:
Yes, it's an unfortunate sacrifice, but one that I fear
must be made.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0018
rows.name: Then what what what must we do to live?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0019
rows.name:
I would suggest jumping—the odds of survival are a
smidgen higher. But the choice is yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_JNK0220
rows.name: Turn Away

rows.label: qev013805_SEL0221
rows.name: Avert your eyes from the horrible scene.

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0029
rows.name: Time's up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0030
rows.name: Now for our final guest...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0031
rows.name:
I like humans, you know? I want to understand them.
But I so so don't like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0032
rows.name: I choose not to die here for your gratification, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0035
rows.name: You disgust me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_SEL0321
rows.name: Stand by helplessly as the Ma-non dies.

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0042
rows.name: What fools. ...And with that, our goal is accomplished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0043
rows.name: Let us hope this serves to educate the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0044
rows.name:
Spare me your judgment! We agreed to raise
New LA to a higher standard, did we not?
Surely you understood what that entailed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0046
rows.name: Coming to this planet taught me something...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0047
rows.name:
The xenos who destroyed the Earth are far from our
only threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0048
rows.name:
Ma-non possess diabolical alien technologies.
They're even more dangerous than the Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0049
rows.name:
Were they to turn that technology against the city in
earnest, New LA would be wrested from us in days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0050
rows.name:
At this rate, they'll take everything! Mankind will be
doomed to a dark future as slaves toiling under the
lash of their cruel xeno masters![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0051
rows.name:
But if we take the initiative and eliminate the xeno
threat before they strike, we can spare our people
from that hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_JNK0410
rows.name: Argue

rows.label: qev013805_SEL0411
rows.name: Tell Alex that he's wrong.

rows.label: qev013805_JNK0420
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev013805_SEL0421
rows.name: Reluctantly concede that Alex's plan has some merit.

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0057
rows.name: I'm glad you understand. Truly I do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0058
rows.name:
I'll be in touch. I hope you'll be as understanding and
supportive at that time as you have been now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0064
rows.name: Ow... That hurt...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0065
rows.name:
Oh, but don't worry. It's only a scratch, yes?
My years of practice playing dead finally paid off,
it seems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0066
rows.name:
Some humans are wicked, aren't they? We Ma-non
know this, and yet I think we failed to appreciate it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0070
rows.name:
Still, I hope that our races can cooperate despite
people like him, you know?
...Oh oh! And I need to repay you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0068
rows.name:
Um, but it seems I dropped everything of value, huh?
So so many apologies. Can you forgive me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0069
rows.name:
...Ow. If you'll excuse me, I'll be heading back to
New LA now, okay? Good-bye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0073
rows.name:
You understand nothing! Does the current situation not
raise the alarm in your mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0074
rows.name: Coming to this planet taught me something...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0075
rows.name:
The xenos who destroyed the Earth are far from our
only threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0076
rows.name:
Ma-non possess diabolical alien technologies.
They're even more dangerous than the Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0077
rows.name:
Were they to turn that technology against the city in
earnest, New LA would be wrested from us in days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0078
rows.name:
At this rate, they'll take everything! Mankind will be
doomed to a dark future as slaves toiling under the
lash of their cruel xeno masters![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0079
rows.name:
But if we take the initiative and eliminate the xeno
threat before they strike, we can spare our people
from that hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0086
rows.name:
Hmph. I see you've succumbed to the same blind
optimism as the rest of the masses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0087
rows.name:
Allowing this irresponsible fraternization to continue will
only lead to human suffering.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0080
rows.name:
And if you will not see the truth through reason,
my only choice is to resort to force![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0088
rows.name:
For you see, I am far from alone in wishing New LA
to be cleansed of its xeno infestation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0089
rows.name:
Others who share in my vision have come together to
fight for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0081
rows.name:
And any humans that would place themselves between
our truth and the Ma-non can die along with them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0082
rows.name: Thank you so so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0083
rows.name: Express Remorse

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0084
rows.name: Apologize profusely for what happened.

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0085
rows.name: Express Concern

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0090
rows.name: Ask Wikaye if she is hurt and how you can help her.

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0092
rows.name:
Some humans are wicked, aren't they? We Ma-non
know this, and yet I think we failed to appreciate it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0093
rows.name: Perhaps the failure lies with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0094
rows.name:
Still, I hope that our races can cooperate despite
people like him, you know?
...Oh oh! And I need to repay you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0096
rows.name:
Don’t worry. If it came down to it, I’d have
played dead. I’m pretty good at it, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0097
rows.name:
It takes more than this to get a Ma-non down,
you know? So don't worry about it, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0098
rows.name:
Some of my kind are wicked, yes? So how could
we expect better of humans? We didn't think it
through, is the problem...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0099
rows.name: Perhaps it really is as simple as that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0102
rows.name:
Anyway, please allow me to reward you for your
assistance, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013805_MSG0106
rows.name:
I would be pleased for you to have this.
Thank you so so so much! Oh, and I hope to see
you again in the city soon, if that's all right?[ST:wait ]
